rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0001
rows.name:
Well, here we are. Welcome aboard,
my honored guests.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0002
rows.name:
It's funny. I was expecting it to be
all glitz and glamor. Halls of gold,
diamond chandeliers and all that.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0003
rows.name:
But there's nothing like that here.
I like this much better.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0004
rows.name:
It all depends on the country. Some of
the nobility like to travel in style. And
believe me, they don't go halfway...

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0005
rows.name:
Superbia, on the other hand,
is a military state. They take a
more pragmatic approach.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0006
rows.name:
Just as their emperor must be a
masterful Driver, so must their
diplomatic vessels be armed for war.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0007
rows.name: That is the Superbian way.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0008
rows.name:
So long as its mission is not a covert
one, every flagship under our command
must be a throne I may ascend.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0009
rows.name:
And if the leader is the first to fall,
what then?

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0010
rows.name: Shin

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0011
rows.name:
It's all right Laura. He makes a valid
point.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0012
rows.name:
That is why Wadatsume and
Kagutsuchi, the Jewels of the Empire,
have been bestowed upon me.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0013
rows.name: Your Majesty.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0014
rows.name:
We will do everything in our power
to protect you, Your Majesty. Even
at the cost of our lives.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0015
rows.name:
I am blessed to have such loyal
companions.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0016
rows.name: Your Majesty, we have urgent news!

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0017
rows.name:
His Majesty is currently entertaining
guests.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0018
rows.name:
I would entreat you not to incur
his displeasure.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0019
rows.name:
Ah, m-my humble apologies,
Your Majesty!

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0020
rows.name:
It's all right. I trust this is news of
special importance. Please, give us
your tidings.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0021
rows.name: O-of course, Your Majesty!

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0022
rows.name:
As you know, we've applied stricter
regulations to our scout patrols in light
of the recent tragedy at Trigo...

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0023
rows.name:
Well, one of our patrols happened upon
a young Gormotti near the camp at
Seigle Fell, but they lost track of him.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0024
rows.name: So...you think he might be a survivor?

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0025
rows.name:
We believe so. We can send out
further patrols immediately, if His
Majesty assents.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0026
rows.name:
I see. I'm sorry that we had to keep
you waiting. Please, go ahead.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0027
rows.name: Yes, Your Majesty!

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0028
rows.name:
I would like for our country to
shelter as many refugees as falls
within our means.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0029
rows.name: I do hope he can be found quickly.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0030
rows.name: Wait! We should go with them!

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0031
rows.name:
What for? Their army's not exactly
short-staffed.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0032
rows.name:
He's just a kid. He'll be scared
witless of the soldiers. Of course
he's going to run away!

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0033
rows.name:
Laura's got a point..
Very well, let's head out.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0034
rows.name:
We would do well to make haste before
he strays any further afield.

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0035
rows.name: Thanks, guys!

rows.label: fev11_320_175_msg0036
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]You're such a bunch of do-gooders. It's
gonna land us in trouble someday...
